content: विन्यासः {@--1@} Entrusting, depositing. {@--2@} A deposit. {@--3@} Arrangement, adjustment, disposition; अक्षरविन्यासः ‘inscribing letters’; प्रत्यक्षरश्लेषमयप्रबंधविन्यासवैदग्धनिधिः <ls>Vās.</ls> ‘composition of a work &c.’ {@--4@} A collection, an assemblage. {@--5@} A site or receptacle.
